entries.femaleVariant: OK. We've arrived.
Exact opposite.
Exactly the contrary, cowboy. Startin' to feel really alive for once.
I doubted you would come.
And once we're on the other side?
Great, and once we've crossed, what then?
Hey, Jude. Ya made it.
Got one last thing to take care of. It'll only take a sec.
Let's, uh, float.
Yeah, Carol gave me a ride. Never woulda found this place otherwise.
I need you too, River.
OK. I'll be waitin' right here.
River, hi!
Hey. Damn, you look good, V.
You think you do, V, but I don't. Not really.
A family, a new beginning – that's what you need.
Well, time to move. Before that storm finds us.
A'right. So the plan, one more time.
entries.maleVariant: All right. So the plan, one more time.

entries.femaleVariant: Wait – we talkin' about one of those famous Aldecaldo tunnels?
And nobody's likely to spot us?
We won't take any official crossing, I think you know that, right?
So there's this old smuggling tunnel. Forgotten. We'll aim to use that. It's near the wall.
We make for our meeting point, join the rest of our people there. Then we'll move on towards Tucson.
Mhm. One of the oldest ones, this one, too. They dug through right after the first war.
Thanks.
Now I'll owe you a favor.
Looks like I've got a debt of gratitude to pay now.
Oh, come the fuck on. We're all riding in the same wagon.
And once there, we call the shots, right?
We know the roads like the back of our hand. And down in Arizona, we have some old favors to call in.
Sooner or later the border guards will realize something's not right.
And thanks to you we stole enough Arasaka tech to build an aircraft carrier.
Believe me, on the list of those wanted dead or alive, our names are right under yours.
[Stand] Think I'm running away?
[Stand] Think it's worth the sacrifice?
Think I'm running? Is that how this looks to you?
entries.maleVariant: Think I'm running? That's how this looks to you?

entries.femaleVariant: No, I never said that.
So it's worth it to you? To sacrifice for the city?
Yeah, I'm stayin'. Got to.
Got my sister, you know. She…
She's a grown woman.
Yeah, but she's no good alone, can't manage. Besides…
What?
Night City… it's my city, V.
Sensed as much…
So you're choosing Night City.
I sensed as much. Goddammit, River... I just couldn't get myself to believe it. Didn't wanna believe it.
entries.maleVariant: Sensed as much. Goddammit, River... I just couldn't get myself to believe it. Didn't wanna believe it.

entries.femaleVariant: Really?
So, you're choosin' Night City.
Really.
So you understand?
Didn't say that.
I can't go with you. I just can't.
Think we knew we wouldn't get a happily-ever-after. Think we both knew.
Ah, I dunno, I-I guess…
Anybody likely to take an interest in us?
But by the time they get around to it, we'll be far, far away. Plus, that storm's a true stroke of luck – it should cover our tracks.
We'll need more than a storm to keep the corpos off our tail.
Got bigger concerns than us. And even if they don't, just let 'em try and catch us. They'll regret it.
It's open along its entire course. And all it needs is to stay open for us this last time. Then it can collapse. We won't be needing it anymore.
Thanks.
It's high time.

entries.maleVariant: Heyyy. You're here.
What'd you think?

entries.femaleVariant: You scan it? Sure the tunnel's even open, hasn't caved in anywhere?
entries.maleVariant: You scan it? You sure the tunnel's even open, hasn't caved in anywhere?

entries.femaleVariant: [pl_pl]Mogłem się tego spodziewać.
entries.maleVariant: Shoulda sensed this coming...
Might've expected as much.

entries.femaleVariant: [pl_pl]O czym ty mówisz?
entries.maleVariant: What the fuck're you talkin' about?
Why? W-what're you sayin'?
Concocted yourself a new beginning. You chose it, and it's comin' fast. And I understand, man, I do.

entries.femaleVariant: So all that chat about the loops of life, what was that?
I do. Just... Night City's a closed book to me.

entries.maleVariant: Who says you'd even have to come back? The fuck was all that chat about life's loops?

entries.femaleVariant: Just go.
entries.maleVariant: Go.

entries.femaleVariant: I understand it all.
entries.maleVariant: I get it, I understand.
So... go, already.
Really glad to see you.
Mean to say I've become that predictable?
No. Just gotten to know you that well, is all.
Can't throw it all away. But then I guess you know that, too.
V... I can't leave. Not now. Not yet.
"Life's a party – woo! – so long as you don't have to make any hard choices." Kerry Eurodyne in a nutshell.
Hey, that's not fair...
But I still got biz to take care of there.
Well, thing with loops is we all got our own. And they're singular at base.
Ours just intertwined for a bit.
For a bit.
I know, I thought we'd make it, too, I did. But that was just fuckin' Night City, its illusions whisperin' sweet nothings in our ears.
Looks like we might've believed them.
Who wouldn't've?
And you know... if you ever pass through Night City, don't be a stranger, all right? Gimme a call?

entries.femaleVariant: Hey, Mitch.
Hey. Let's get the fuck out of here, shall we?
Hey. How are things? Is everything arranged?
Everything's almost set.
So you found it? Where we thought it would be?
They are indeed.
[Stand] I need you too, River.
Thought about it, lots. I get why you wanna leave. Light of everything that's happened.
V needs a fresh start. More'n that – deserves one.
But look around. You've found your family. Lemme have mine. And lemme take care of them.
There's just one thing I'm damn good at. And that's it.
Good luck, V.
Good luck, River.
What's that mean, River, really? City sure doesn't give a shit about you.
It's not a thing, V. The city's people. People I'm responsible for. It's A... a complex pledge to perform a duty, a duty I... I don't want to run from.
Plan – let's go through it again.
Defense systems along the border – what about them?
Look, tunnel's cool and all, but we gotta get there first. And what about security up and down the border?
Don't worry. We know what's there and what to do about it. And Carol and Cassidy will keep the corpos off our tail.
Hm, so even if I wanted to, I got nothin' to worry about.
Starting today, it's not all on your back. You're no longer alone, V. You'll get used to it. It's nice.

entries.maleVariant: So this is it, huh? Start of your great adventure. Gotta say, it's lookin' a little... apocalyptic – surroundings and everything.
Not even for me.

entries.femaleVariant: [pl_pl]I zrobisz to beze mnie?
entries.maleVariant: Gonna see to it without me?

entries.femaleVariant: [pl_pl]Rozumiem. Ja już pożegnałem Night City.
entries.maleVariant: I get it. Already said goodbye to Night City myself.

entries.femaleVariant: And you'll see to it without me? Not a problem, I guess.

entries.maleVariant: I understand, Kerry. I understand it all.
Hey... Unfair. You know I…

entries.femaleVariant: It'd be a few months, Ker. We'd figure something out after. Most of your fuckin' tours're longer than that, shit.

entries.maleVariant: Fuck, V! Fuck! Fine! I'm scared! Afraid of the future! And afraid to leave the city at a moment like this!
If I leave with you now and have to come back, alone…? V, I couldn't take it. I couldn't.
Please. Please try to understand.
Truly?
Said my goodbyes to Night City. Ready for whatever comes next. But your story there is far from over. I get it.
Gonna finish that album, V. Count on you giving it a listen once I'm done? Before I unleash it on the rest of the world?
Yeah, sure. Just... hurry.
Yeah. I promise.
I am, I'm goin'.

entries.femaleVariant: And you gotta leave me to take care of my family.
Look out for yourself, River.
Just here, now, think I realized I never felt right in Night City.
Used to think there'd come a day when I'd finally call it home. Thought... any moment now, I'll feel safe, even comfy.
You're not running away. This is a new opportunity.
Think I know what you mean.
You're not running. You're getting a new beginning. It's a whole 'nother stage of life.
Hm. Interesting to hear you say that.
It's betrayal you sense. Feels like you're betraying it, and somehow the city knows. And it stands in judgment.
Yeah. It's like – I wanna leave, but it's pulling me back in. Like it's got another sweet, sweet promise just for me.
Y'know, I used to mark time in stages. One juncture to the next.
There was the megabuilding hole-in-the-wall phase, and then the group home phase, the Mox phase…
Every time, I thought I'd found a home. And every damn time, I came away disappointed.
Things'll be different, now.
The very reason we gotta leave.
You'll see, we'll have a home, we'll be home soon.
Things'll be different now. You'll see.
Promise?
Life in Night City in a nutshell, I'd say.
I know that now. Didn't have any doubts about leavin', you know. I gotta go.
We'll be goin' soon.
Headin' out soon. Gotta get ahead of that storm. And stay on Panam's good side.
Yeah, Carol said a thing or two, warned me.
Don't worry. You'll like 'er.
No. Don't wanna promise you a thing. Don't have to.
And find something new, more lasting – for yourself, for us.
It's a vision I like… a lot.
Me too. We're gonna be all right.
So? We going?
Why? Thought I'd stay in Night City?
Well here I am. Disappointed?
Why? Thought I'd stay in Night City?
Yet here I am. Disappointed?
You don't seem like one who'd care to make a fresh start. Ever.
Get to know me better, could change your mind.
That remains to be seen, child.
"See the child. He is pale and thin..."
OK.
You look like shit. Do the great outdoors truly serve you so poorly?
I'm dyin'. Could be that.
Great outdoors seem to have done wonders for you.
I'm dyin', Cassidy. Could be the reason, that.
Heh. Can always count on getting complimented when you're around.
Hahahaha… I always did love the optimism of youth.
Bad thoughts are cheap, but they smear over the truth like mud. You think you'll run outta fuel before the stop? You will. You think you're about to die? Your days are numbered.
Now, you had better ready yourself. We've got a border to cross and a storm to run from. It's a helluva lot for one day.
Seems the great outdoors and fresh air've done you a lot of good, old man. Kept you spry.
It's not the air. It's just been one conviction. It lets me fall asleep like a babe come nightfall and wake up with a clean conscience with the dawn.
Got a feeling I'm about to learn it.
We nomads choose who to make our family. And choice forges strong bonds and a higher duty that stand solid as an old oak.
I do. Believe I always did.
It doesn't matter what happens, what will happen. Within this family, nobody turns their back on you. Do you understand?
V, let me be thoroughly honest with you.
Hmm. You know what, V? If you're here talking about life and death, you're still alive.
Don't forget that.
Thanks, Cass.
Need help?
Need any help preparin'?
No. It's all packed and ready to go. We were waitin' for you, that's all.
All plans laid and in place?
[Embrace] But it was pure illusion. I know.
But it was pure illusion. I know.
[Embrace] You'll find your home.
Mhm. Seems so far away, so innocent from here... Strange feelin' I'm havin'. As if I was... a fugitive, almost.
You'll find your place, where you really belong, now.
Only say that because you've already found it.
I say it because I know you will, too.
So why the hell do I feel like... I'm running away?
All those promises are empty.
Forget Night City.
Empty, Judy, all of 'em. But we hold the cards now.
Forget Night City.
Thing is, how?
All set to go?
All set? Ready?
Mhm. When it came down to it, turned out I didn't have much to pack at all.
Everything all right?
So glad you didn't change your mind.
Damn, I'm glad you're here. So fuckin' glad you didn't change your mind.
Haha! Think I made up my mind before you did, hehe.
It's just, uh...
Can always tell when you're lying.
Only 'cause I finally know it'll all be OK.
Can always tell when you're lyin'. For a cop, you're not so hot at keeping your feelings under wraps.
Just never hid them from you, never felt the need.
'Cause I finally know it'll all be OK. Leavin' everything behind.
Everything and everyone.
So, haven't changed your mind, I guess.
Mhm. Also the reason I can see your mind remains... unchanged.
entries.maleVariant: Hm. Also the reason I can see your mind remains, uh... unchanged.

entries.femaleVariant: V, I know what NC does to people. Know what it's done to us.
Good luck, River.
[Hug] I'll miss you…
So this is goodbye.
I'll miss this. Miss it always and forever.
"Your" adventure? Not "ours"?
Kerry, I know you. Something's wrong.

entries.maleVariant: "Your" adventure, huh? I hear that right?
Just spit it out, Ker. What's wrong?
Nothing. What could possibly…? Ugh, nothing, I just, uh... Shit.
Know you... well enough to know that babbling means you're hidin' somethin'. C'mon, out with it. Convoy's gotta get movin' soon.
V... I'm not goin'. I can't.
Well, I… Hmm... I...
Kerry...?
Was going to be "our" adventure, Ker. Or so you let me think…
Fuck. Thought this'd be a lot easier.
Finally got this city by the throat, and I don't intend to let go. Not now.
Look, V – Night City's a shit-stained back alley, I know that. But it's the shit-stained alley I know best, ya get me?

entries.femaleVariant: One of the famed Aldecaldo tunnels?
Never mentioned a tunnel.
A gate in the wall. I like it.
Tunnel? Never mentioned a tunnel.
entries.maleVariant: Tunnel? You never mentioned a tunnel.

entries.femaleVariant: You never asked.
It wasn't easy to find after all these years. Thankfully, it's still open. Nothing can stop us now.
Aldecaldos stopped using it years ago. We got tipped off that Night Corp had found it and started monitoring the area.
So you found a gate in the wall. Clever.
Not in, as much as under.
It's one of those old smuggling tunnels. Thankfully, it's still open.
It wasn't the easiest thing to locate after all these years. But now – nothing can stop us now.
Get in, V.
What are we waiting for?
[Lean] Hey, you made it.
[Lean] Hey, River.
Hey, Judy.
Braindance club, in Chicago, ages ago. But I didn't edit 'em, no – we'd get the ready-mades. I just jacked the dopamineware on the johns and janes. Back when they put the new laws through.
Hm, you clearly got things you need to hash out. Leave you girls to it.
Wonder if I'll miss it...
Whole area's brimmin' with tech. Drones on perpetual patrol. Heavier stuff, too, maybe.
They are indeed.
But someone is supposedly waiting for you... Come see us later. We'll talk about the who, what and how.
Come see us when you're done. We'll talk about the who, what and how.
If I can be sure of anything now, it's that.
Feel better already.
[Hug] I like it too.
Figured I'd stay in Night City?
Here I am. Disappointed?
[Get out]

entries.maleVariant: There you are – wow, finally. Thought I might not see you at all.

entries.femaleVariant: You're here…
V! You're here!
Everything OK?
[Get in]
